general.serviceName: Sign in to or create your GOV.UK Account

phaseBanner.content: This is a new service – your {{-openLink}}feedback{{-closeLink}} will help us to improve it. // {{ target  }} //

cookie.cookieText: GOV.UK uses cookies to make the site simpler.

error500.title: Sorry, there is a problem with this service
error500.header: Sorry, there is a problem with this service

content.paragraph1: Your session has timed out due to inactivity.

enterEmail.title: Sign in to or create your GOV.UK Account
enterEmail.header: Sign in to or create your GOV.UK Account
enterEmail.text: A GOV.UK Account is separate from other government accounts (for example a personal tax account or Government Gateway).

email.label: Email address
email.text: To sign in or create an account, enter your email address

validationError.length: Email address must be 256 characters or fewer
validationError.email: Enter an email address in the correct format, like name@example.com

details.bulletPoint1: let you reuse and share your data to ensure that government services are quicker to interact with
details.bulletPoint2: suggest GOV.UK guidance and information that is relevant to you
details.bulletPoint3: tell you when content you're interested in has been updated
details.bulletPoint4: help you set up reminders for tasks you may need to complete later

whatYouNeed.summary: What you need to create a GOV.UK Account
whatYouNeed.bulletPoint2: a working UK phone number with signal, so we can send you a security code

enterPassword.title: Enter your password
enterPassword.info: Enter your password to sign in

password.label: Enter a password
password.hint: It needs to be at least 8 characters long and must include at least one number

validationError.minLength: Your password must be 8 characters or more
validationError.maxLength: Your password must be less than 256 characters
validationError.alphaNumeric: Your password must include a number

validationError.matches: Enter the same password in both fields

securePasswordDetails.summary: How to create a secure password
securePasswordDetails.text: A good way to create a secure and memorable password is to use 3 random words. You can use numbers, symbols and spaces.

termsOfUse.heading: Agree to our terms of use
termsOfUse.paragraph1: We will collect and save your information securely. We will not share your personal information without your consent.
termsOfUse.paragraph2: By continuing, you confirm that you agree to our privacy notice and our terms and conditions.

info.paragraph1: We will send a 6 digit security code to the number you give us.
info.paragraph2: You must use a UK mobile phone number.

validationError.length: Enter a UK phone number, like 01632 960000 or 07700 900000
validationError.numeric: Phone number must only include numbers

accountCreated.title: You have successfully created your GOV.UK Account
accountCreated.header: You have successfully created your GOV.UK Account

info.heading: A GOV.UK Account will:
info.bulletPoint1: let you reuse and share your data to ensure that government services are quicker to interact with
info.bulletPoint2: suggest GOV.UK guidance and information that is relevant to you
info.bulletPoint3: tell you when content you're interested in has been updated
info.bulletPoint4: help you set up reminders for tasks you may need to complete later

verifyEmail.title: Check your email
verifyEmail.text: We have sent an email to:

info.paragraph1: Once you have opened the email and got the code, come back to this page and enter the security code below.
info.paragraph2: Your email might take a few minutes to arrive. If you do not get an email, check your spam folder.

validationError.maxLength: Enter the security code using only 6 digits
validationError.minLength: Enter the security code using only 6 digits
validationError.invalidFormat: Enter the security code using only 6 digits
validationError.invalidCode: The security code you’ve entered is not correct, try entering it again or get a new security code.

info.paragraph: We sent a code to the [mobile] number you registered.

validationError.maxLength: Enter the security code using only 6 digits
validationError.minLength: Enter the security code using only 6 digits
validationError.invalidFormat: Enter the security code using only 6 digits
validationError.invalidCode: The security code you’ve entered is not correct, try entering it again or get a new security code.

info.paragraph1: You entered the wrong security code too many times.
info.paragraph3: You can then enter your phone number again and get a new code.
